Name: Bounce
About the game: Bounce-puzzle game in which you have to apply your knowledge of geometry in practice to ricochet to remove all the pieces on the level. At each level there are several white shapes that you have to remove. To make it not so easy: you have 1 shot for the whole level. To successfully complete the level, you will have to choose the right place and launch angle.
